{"id":1356175890,"question_id":50,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1723700778,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1356175890/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"8.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\ndouble helper(double x, long long n) {\n    if (n == 0) {\n        return 1.0;\n    }\n    if (n < 0) {\n        return 1.0 / helper(x, -n);\n    }\n    double p = helper(x, n / 2);\n    if (n % 2 == 0) {\n        return p * p;\n    } else {\n        return p * p * x;\n    }\n}\n\ndouble myPow(double x, int n) {\n    return helper(x, n);\n}\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
